title: Requirements
text:
To start this lab, you‚Äôll need the following environments:

Visit the ‚ÄúProgramming Toolkit-webpage‚Äù to learn how to meet all requirements.

Environment: A folder on your machine called competitive and an environment file with your MySQL password

title: Notebook
text:
Load Python libaries and API keys.

import os
import openai
import pandas as pd
import altair as alt
from dotenv import load_dotenv, find_dotenv


_ = load_dotenv(find_dotenv()) # read local .env file
openai.api_key  = os.environ['OPENAI_API_KEY']
